thread.title: Republican candidates to remove gloves, go after Trump at debate
thread.title_full: Republican candidates to remove gloves, go after Trump at debate | News24

author: news24.com
title: Republican candidates to remove gloves, go after Trump at debate
text:
Washington - The unexpected political rise of outspoken billionaire Donald Trump has shaken up Republican presidential politics and his rivals are looking to strike back as they gather for their second debate late Wednesday in California.
Trump has led the crowded Republican field in recent polls, but a CBS News/New York Times poll this week showed fellow outsider Ben Carson, a retired neurosurgeon with no political experience, closing the gap. Trump has 27% support in the survey to Carson's 23%.
Jeb Bush, once considered the likely frontrunner, lags far behind, tied in a distant third with support from just 6% of Republican primary voters.
Several of Trump's Republican rivals have indicated they plan to take on "The Donald" in the debate at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library in Simi Valley, California, north of Los Angeles.
